item.title: About me
item.description: Summary ❝Full-stack software engineer with software development experience including requirements analysis, systems design, integration patterns and testing expanding his horizons towards data science. Agile and LEAN methodology fan that loves hackathons and startup culture. Guitarist, music and photography enthusiast and amateur filmmaker. ❞ Can help with e-commerce, finance, IoT, mobile, cloud, technical interviews, code reviews, startups Top skills java, javascript, python, system design, system architecture, tests

item.title: Contact
item.description: Social media You can follow me on Twitter and PM me if you wish. Email lukasz.p.mroz@gmail.com Address for correspondence Łukasz Mróz IT Solutions ul. Ksawerów 3, 02-656 Warszawa
